original_title: Paul Weller & The BBC Symphony Orchestra: Live from the Barbican
overview: With a career spanning nearly 50 years, Paul Weller remains one of the most successful British singer-songwriters of all time. Known for pushing the boundaries of musical genres to a new level, Jules Buckley curates a special one-off experience as he gives Paul Wellerâ€™s wide-ranging songs the symphonic treatment.
title: Paul Weller & The BBC Symphony Orchestra: Live from the Barbican
